Text: Spec Racer Ford:  The Spec Racer Ford, manufactured and marketed by SCCA Enterprises (a subsidiary of SCCA, Inc.), is a high performance, closed wheel, open cockpit, purpose-built race car intended for paved road courses, such as Mazda Raceway Laguna Seca, Buttonwillow Raceway Park, Road America, Watkins Glen, and many other tracks throughout North America.
Triplets:<Spec Racer Ford
2:
--------------------
<Text: Spec Racer Ford:  With more than 900 cars manufactured, it is the most successful purpose built road racing car in the United States.>
